title: Advanced Legal Education Design Utilizing Visual Simulations

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Basic Legal Concepts and Legal Analysis Skills
context.additional_context: Practice-oriented education linked to project-based assessments in a digital-device-provided environment.

learning_goals: Learners can systematically analyze complex legal principles (e.g., labor law for public officials) using visual tools such as Venn diagrams
Learners acquire problem-solving skills to apply legal concepts to real-world scenarios through simulation-based case studies
Learners complete legal issue mapping and argument structuring projects collaboratively using collaboration tools
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
